page.title: 03Slindon College Horse Racing
page.content: Slindon College, an Independent boys boarding school, is well known for its National Hunt Racing Stables. This is because we are the only school in the country to have racing stables. There are at the moment 12 horses in the stables, of which 6 race.The 6 which race are called Ziparib,Mighty Steel,First Glance,White Nile,Burn's Lad and Rheingold's Gift.The most successful horse we have is Ziparib. The cost for all 12 horses a year is Â£55,000,which includes their daily feed,bedding and other little extras. It is a good thing they pay for themselves! The racing silks are red,white and blue diamonds,and white sleeves and cap. There are 4 boys from the school who work in the stables,one of whom is applying for his jockey's licence.
